# local-agentic Development Guidelines

Auto-generated from all feature plans. Last updated: 2026-01-07

## Active Technologies
- TypeScript 5.3+ / Node.js 18.0+ + fs-extra (file operations), glob (pattern matching), yaml (config parsing), commander (CLI), execa (git operations) (001-repo-setup)
- File system (repository .specify/ and .sokold/ directories) (001-repo-setup)
- TypeScript 5.x, Node.js 18+ + yaml (config parsing), Node.js built-ins (spawn, fs, path) (main)
- YAML config in `.sokold/config.yaml` (main)

- TypeScript 5.x on Node.js 18.x LTS + commander (CLI), execa (process), fs-extra (files), yaml (config), glob (patterns) - 6 minimal trusted libraries (main)
